metadata.title: CVE-2023-29827 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** ejs v3.1.9 is vulnerable to server-side template injection.If the ejs file is controllable, template injection can be implementedthrough the configuration settings of the closeDelimiter parameter. NOTE:this is disputed by the vendor because the render function is not intendedto be used with untrusted input.

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
